html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-05172023-06-01ISI
ActPatent Act
SubjectRules Amending the Patent Rules
PrecisRules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to (1) adjust most service fees by 25% over the 2024 service fees; (2) expand the definition of a small business by increasing the number of employees from 50 employees to 99 employees; and (3) make minor administrative amendments to clarify the application of the Rules.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2023-0113 Publication Date: 2023-06-21
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Rules Amending the Patent Rules
precis: Rules Amending the PATENT RULES in order to (1) adjust most service fees by 25% over the 2024 service fees; (2) expand the definition of a small business by increasing the number of employees from 50 employees to 99 employees; and (3) make minor administrative amendments to clarify the application of the Rules.
